Test Name: Antinuclear Antibody (ANA) Screen with reflex ENA and dsDNA
Purpose: Detection of antinuclear, extractable nuclear, and double-stranded DNA antibodies to aid in the diagnosis of autoimmune disorders.
Container: Red-top tube or serum separator tube (SST)
Equipment: Immunofluorescence microscope, ANA HEp-2 cell substrate slides, ELISA/CL-IFA platforms
